hotels.title: Ibiza Cliffside Elegance with Four Pools, Direct Beach Access & Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Discover Mediterranean elegance at this cliffside retreat on the eastern coast of Ibiza at Cala Llonga, just metres from the waters of the Balearic Sea. Be among the first to find true serenity in your sophisticated room accented by earthy shades of bone and ochre, then step out to explore the beautiful coastal paradise. Wake to breathtaking sea views, lounge by a lively pool with a refreshing cocktail in hand, and ending your day at the chic rooftop bar, where signature drinks meet Mediterranean sunsets. Dine in and savour delicious tastes at one of seven onsite restaurants and bars.
